name: Cart Drawer - Adding a product with variations to the cart - Verify Choose Options drawer gets open when user click on add to cart against a product which has multiple variants from PLP and after adding to cart Cart Drawer opens
fullName: mason_sb_minicart_drawer_guest.spec.js#Mason Cart Drawer Cart Drawer - Adding a product with variations to the cart - Verify Choose Options drawer gets open when user click on add to cart against a product which has multiple variants from PLP and after adding to cart Cart Drawer opens

steps.name: locator.count(#mainMenu ul[role="menu"] > li >> internal:has="a.cursor-pointer:has-text(\"Women\")" >> nth=0 >> div.customtablescrollbar.group-hover\:flex >> ul > li a.cursor-pointer)
locator.textContent(#mainMenu ul[role="menu"] > li >> internal:has="a.cursor-pointer:has-text(\"Women\")" >> nth=0 >> div.customtablescrollbar.group-hover\:flex >> ul > li a.cursor-pointer >> nth=17)
locator.click(#mainMenu ul[role="menu"] > li >> internal:has="a.cursor-pointer:has-text(\"Women\")" >> nth=0 >> div.customtablescrollbar.group-hover\:flex >> ul > li a.cursor-pointer >> nth=17)
locator.hover(div.swiper-wrapper >> nth=28)
